name: Multi-Propulsion
description:
Each player controls one thruster of a rocket in this game. The goal of each level is to repair each disruption in space time by moving the rocket over it, but be careful! Once you move over it, you can't move back over it again. There are 3 levels of increasing difficulty, where you have to figure out the right order to repair each disruption.

W and S moves the red thruster

The up and down keys move the blue thruster

T and G moves the green thruster

Numpad 8 and numpad 5 moves the yellow thruster

Hitting 1 restarts the level

Hitting 2 brings you back to the level select screen

Made for the TSA Video Game Design contest.

Font used in the game is https://managore.itch.io/m6x11 by Daniel Linssen
